content: I am a PhD Candidate in Finance at the Swiss Finance Institute and University of Zurich. My work is at the frontier of banking and other related fields: banking with asset pricing and banking with labor economics. In particular, I have extensively researched bank behaviour in the OTC markets for swaps and bonds, the impact of bank funding constraints on the labor market, as well as the effects of non-conventional monetary policy on SMEs. Prior to my PhD, I was a consultant at Frontier Economics in London, where I specialized in regulatory issues and competition policy for financial services.
